page.title: 04A 12 year old in Hellesdon
page.content: I am twelve years old,and my name is Leo. On Saturday June the 15th 1985,I woke up at 9:00am and my mum brought me a cup of tea.At 9:15am I got up and got dressed,then went and had a breakfast of cornflakes.Then I went to play on my computer with 3 friends at home. We played for nearly 3 hours 'til 12:45pm. Then I went to change my library book.At 1:10pm I arrived home to have dinner.We had a barbeque with beefburgers and sausages. After dinner I went to Jarrolds with my parents.We bought a Patio set and two reclining Sunbeds.We got back at 3:30pm and I watched cricket on TV until around 6:00pm then I went to buy our tea at Moneys Fish and Chip shop. At 6:45pm I settled down to read a book called "The Mystery of the Magic Circle" and watched TV.I went to bed at 10:15pm .
